LanguageData.SMM_Bardiche.label: bardiche
LanguageData.SMM_Bardiche.description: A long pole-arm with a large, hooked blade at the end. Slow, but inflicts a lot of damage.
LanguageData.SMM_Bardiche.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Bardiche.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Bardiche.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Bat.label: bat
LanguageData.SMM_Bat.description: The bat is a weapon once used long ago in the ancient game of baseball. The sport has long since faded into obscurity, but the bat has stuck around, though it's now used for bashing in skulls instead of hitting home runs.
LanguageData.SMM_Bat.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Bat.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.SMM_BatChained.label: chained bat
LanguageData.SMM_BatChained.description: The bat is a weapon once used long ago in the ancient game of baseball. The sport has long since faded into obscurity, but the bat has stuck around, though it's now used for bashing in skulls instead of hitting home runs. This one has been wrapped in chains to provide some extra punch to the impact.
LanguageData.SMM_BatChained.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_BatChained.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.SMM_Baton.label: baton
LanguageData.SMM_Baton.description: A light blunt weapon used by police and military across the galaxy as a defensive weapon.
LanguageData.SMM_Baton.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Baton.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_BatSpiked.label: spiked bat
LanguageData.SMM_BatSpiked.description: The bat is a weapon once used long ago in the ancient game of baseball. The sport has long since faded into obscurity, but the bat has stuck around, though it's now used for bashing in skulls instead of hitting home runs. This one has nails driven through the end. If the spikes don't kill you, the tetanus will.
LanguageData.SMM_BatSpiked.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_BatSpiked.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.SMM_BatSpiked.tools.nails.label: nails
LanguageData.SMM_Billhook.label: billhook
LanguageData.SMM_Billhook.description:
A short bladed machete with a hooked end. Often used by farmers, as the hooked blade allows it slice through foliage and crops with ease.
[BONUS]: +15% Plant Work Speed.
LanguageData.SMM_Billhook.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Billhook.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Billhook.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Claymore.label: claymore
LanguageData.SMM_Claymore.description: A large two handed sword of ancient design, the Claymore can pierce and slash through flesh and bone alike.
LanguageData.SMM_Claymore.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Claymore.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Claymore.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Cleaver.label: cleaver
LanguageData.SMM_Cleaver.description:
A short knife with a heavy broad blade. Perfect for butchering carcasses.
[BONUS]: +10% Butchery Speed and +5 Butchery Effiency.
LanguageData.SMM_Cleaver.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Cleaver.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Crowbar.label: crowbar
LanguageData.SMM_Crowbar.description: A tool with a chiseled end and a curved head. Often used to open wooden crates or to remove large nails, but can be used to lethal effect with wielded as a weapon.
LanguageData.SMM_Crowbar.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Crowbar.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_Dagger.label: dagger
LanguageData.SMM_Dagger.description: A small knife with a pointed, double edged blade.
LanguageData.SMM_Dagger.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Dagger.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.SMM_Dagger.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Fireaxe.label: fireaxe
LanguageData.SMM_Fireaxe.description: A large axe with a razor sharp, broad blade on one side and a pick on the other. Much heavier than the Hatcher, but much more damaging.
LanguageData.SMM_Fireaxe.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Fireaxe.tools.pick.label: pick
LanguageData.SMM_Fireaxe.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Glaive.label: glaive
LanguageData.SMM_Glaive.description: A pole-arm with a large blade on the end. Faster than the other pole-arms, but not as damaging.
LanguageData.SMM_Glaive.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Glaive.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Glaive.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Halberd.label: halberd
LanguageData.SMM_Halberd.description: A long pole-arm with an axe head for hacking and a long spike for stabbing. Slower than the other pole-arms, but more effective.
LanguageData.SMM_Halberd.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Halberd.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Halberd.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Hatchet.label: hatchet
LanguageData.SMM_Hatchet.description: A small, one handed axe. Fitted with a sharp head and a flat side for blunt work.
LanguageData.SMM_Hatchet.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Hatchet.tools.hammerhead.label: hammerhead
LanguageData.SMM_Hatchet.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Hooksword.label: hooksword
LanguageData.SMM_Hooksword.description: A short sword that ends in a hook. Hookswords are incredibly light, allowing the user to make quick strikes.
LanguageData.SMM_Hooksword.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Hooksword.tools.hook.label: hook
LanguageData.SMM_Hooksword.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Karambit.label: karambit
LanguageData.SMM_Karambit.description: A small, but incredibly sharp curved blade. Used to quickly and lethally strike at vital spots, cutting through flesh and bone alike.
LanguageData.SMM_Karambit.tools.knuckle.label: knuckle
LanguageData.SMM_Karambit.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.SMM_Karambit.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Khopesh.label: khopesh
LanguageData.SMM_Khopesh.description: Often referred to as a "Sickle Sword", the Khopesh is a short curved sword evolved from battle axes. The inside curve of the weapon was designed to trap an opponents arm.
LanguageData.SMM_Khopesh.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Khopesh.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Khopesh.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Kukri.label: kukri
LanguageData.SMM_Kukri.description: A recurved knife used as both a tool and a weapon. Fast, and very sharp.
LanguageData.SMM_Kukri.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Kukri.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.SMM_Kukri.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Machete.label: machete
LanguageData.SMM_Machete.description: A sharp, broad bladed short sword. Often used as a tool for clearing brush in jungles and forest, but will cut through flesh just as easy.
LanguageData.SMM_Machete.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Machete.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Machete.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Mallet.label: mallet
LanguageData.SMM_Mallet.description:
A small hammer with a large blunt head. Inneffective as a weapon, but great for shaping hot metals at a smithy.
[BONUS]: +8% Smithing Speed.
LanguageData.SMM_Mallet.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Mallet.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_Maul.label: maul
LanguageData.SMM_Maul.description: A devastating heavy weapon with a sledge on one side and an axe head on the other. Can easily pulverize flesh and bone into dust.
LanguageData.SMM_Maul.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Maul.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_Pickaxe.label: pickaxe
LanguageData.SMM_Pickaxe.description:
An ancient tool, composed of a dense shaft with a double sided chisel head. Used around the galaxy in mining operations, but can also be used as a somewhat effective melee weapon.
[BONUS]: +15% Mining Speed.
LanguageData.SMM_Pickaxe.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Pickaxe.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_Pike.label: pike
LanguageData.SMM_Pike.description: A long pole-arm with a razor sharp pointed head, ideal for thrusting.
LanguageData.SMM_Pike.tools.shaft.label: shaft
LanguageData.SMM_Pike.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Pitchfork.label: pitchfork
LanguageData.SMM_Pitchfork.description: A farming tool used for moving hay. While it's 4 pronged head is designed for stabbing throug piles of hay, it can just as easily stab through flesh.
LanguageData.SMM_Pitchfork.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Pitchfork.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_Pollaxe.label: pollaxe
LanguageData.SMM_Pollaxe.description: A long pole-arm with a broad axe head on one side and a spiked hammer on the other. The most balanced of the pole-arms, combining damage and speed.
LanguageData.SMM_Pollaxe.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Pollaxe.tools.point-0.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Pollaxe.tools.point-1.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Pollaxe.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Quarterstaff.label: quarterstaff
LanguageData.SMM_Quarterstaff.description: A long polearm, composed of a heavy shaft with spiked braces on both ends.
LanguageData.SMM_Quarterstaff.tools.shaft.label: shaft
LanguageData.SMM_Quarterstaff.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_Scimitar.label: scimitar
LanguageData.SMM_Scimitar.description: A long sword with a back curved blade, originating from the eastern old era.
LanguageData.SMM_Scimitar.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Scimitar.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Scimitar.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Scythe.label: scythe
LanguageData.SMM_Scythe.description:
A rudimentary tool, composed of a long shaft with a curved blade at the end. While it is a decent weapon, the scythe is a far more efficient method of harvesting crops than picking them by hand.
[BONUS]: +15% Plant Work Speed | +15% Harvest Yield.
LanguageData.SMM_Scythe.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Scythe.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Scythe.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Sickle.label: sickle
LanguageData.SMM_Sickle.description:
A tool with a sharp curved blade, often used by farmers. The shape of the blade allows it harvest crops more efficiently than by hand.
[BONUS]: +15% Plant Harvest Yield.
LanguageData.SMM_Sickle.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Sickle.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Sickle.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.SMM_Sledgehammer.label: sledgehammer
LanguageData.SMM_Sledgehammer.description: A heavy, double sided sledge, used for smashing rocks, but will smash skulls just as easy.
LanguageData.SMM_Sledgehammer.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Sledgehammer.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchClub.label: trench club
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchClub.description: Trench Clubs are old world era weapons used in close quarters combat. A dense handle with a thick, spiked head makes for the lethal damage.
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchClub.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchClub.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchKnife.label: trench knife
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchKnife.description: An ancient knife design dated back to the wars of the old worlds. A razor sharp knife, with brass knuckles fused to the handle.
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchKnife.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchKnife.tools.knuckles.label: knuckles
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchKnife.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.SMM_TrenchKnife.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Warclub.label: warclub
LanguageData.SMM_Warclub.description: A primitive weapon design often used by tribals on the outer rimworlds. A heavy shaft fitted with a rounded head. Simple, but quite effective.
LanguageData.SMM_Warclub.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Warclub.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SMM_Zweihander.label: zweihander
LanguageData.SMM_Zweihander.description: A hulking two handed sword. While heavy and slow, the Zweihander can easily cleave through a would-be attacker.
LanguageData.SMM_Zweihander.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.SMM_Zweihander.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.SMM_Zweihander.tools.edge.label: edge
